game.name: Arena Toolbox
game.desc: Custom scripts build by ORA team to enhance your RetroPie experience.

game.name: Fan Control
game.desc: Change the fan settings to control cooling and fan noise.

game.name: 2 - Medium Rate
game.desc: To update the fan to the HIGHER COOLING RATE the factory Odroid settings select this option. DISCLAIMER: PERFORM AT YOUR OWN RISK. NO IMPLIED WARRANTIES.

game.name: 3 - Aggressive Rate
game.desc: To update the fan to the most AGGRESSIVE COOLING RATE compared to the factory Odroid settings select this option. The tan will become noticeably loud. DISCLAIMER: PERFORM AT YOUR OWN RISK. NO IMPLIED WARRANTIES.

game.name: Controller Reset
game.desc: This will wipe out all controller configurations, and reset everything to factory default. NOTE: THIS WILL CAUSE YOUR SYSTEM TO REBOOT.

game.name: RetroPie Reference
game.desc: This utility provides common information about Retropie including information about Emulation Station, Retroarch, and ROM information.

game.name: Soft Reboot
game.desc: Perform a soft reboot to recover local keyboard function if not functional. NOTE: Typically only needed after exit from PSP games and there is a need to access the terminal by exit from EmulationStation.

game.name: System Info Utility
game.desc: View your CPU temps, IP connectivity, and storage to include external storage addons.

game.name: Bluetooth
game.desc: Register and connect to bluetooth devices. Unregister and remove devices, and display registered and connected devices.

game.name: Configuration Editor
game.desc: Change common RetroArch options, and manually edit RetroArch configs, global configs, and non-RetroArch configs.

game.name: Retroarch
game.desc: Launches the RetroArch GUI so you can change RetroArch options. Note: Changes will not be saved unless you have enabled the "Save Configuration On Exit" option.

game.name: RetroArch Net Play
game.desc: Set up RetroArch Netplay options, choose host or client, port, host IP, delay frames, and your nickname.

game.name: Run Command Configuration
game.desc: Change what appears on the runcommand screen. Enable or disable the menu, enable or disable box art, and change CPU configuration.

game.name: Audio
game.desc: Configure audio settings. Choose default of auto, 3.5mm jack, or HDMI. Mixer controls, and apply default settings.

game.name: Wi-Fi Setup
game.desc: Launch NMTUI and connect to a wireless network.

game.name: PC Engine/TurboGrafx16 Swap
game.desc: This script will swap the NEC PC Engine and TurboGrafx-16 themes to display on the main menu. NOTE: You will need to restart Emulation Station after making the change.

game.name: 1 - Default Rate
game.desc: To restore the fan to the factory Odroid settings select this option.

game.name: Genesis/MegaDrive Swap
game.desc: This script will swap the Sega Genesis and Sega MegaDrive themes to display on the main menu. NOTE: You will need to restart Emulation Station after making the change.

game.name: Show IP
game.desc: Displays your current IP address, as well as other information provided by the command, "ip addr show."

game.name: ES Themes
game.desc: Install, uninstall, or update EmulationStation themes. Most themes can be previewed at https://github.com/retropie/ RetroPie-Setup/wiki/themes.

game.name: Splash Screens
game.desc: Enable or disable the splashscreen on RetroPie boot. Choose a splashscreen, download new splashscreens, and return splashscreen to default.

game.name: Toggle BGM
game.desc: Enable or disable the background music feature.

game.name: RetroPie Setup
game.desc: Install RetroPie from binary or source, install experimental packages, additional drivers, edit samba shares, custom scraper, as well as other RetroPie-related configurations.

game.name: File Manager
game.desc: Basic ascii file manager for linux allowing you to browse, copy, delete, and move files.
